attributes.additional_details: May you please save the Avenue from closing.If the Avenue closes that will mean all the young people who were using the Avenue will be bored and turn to crime.The Avenue has been a very impotant department that supports young people in Meadowell if Northtyneside Council Closes the Avenue that means all the qualified youthworkers will have no jobs.Culture and Diversity Northtyneside a project that helps to reduce racism through community engangement will also have no where to work from.This will also mean meadowel will go back to being unsafe. Youth workers have most valued knowledge how to reduce crime by enganging the young people will go. Closing the Avenue will be turning one of the most valued service into a crime scene .The Clinic which provide STI SCREENING and sexual health for the young people will go and that will be affect but the whole community, with sexually transmited  diseases and  more  Please help us to save the AVENUE by signing and sharing this petition.
